text: My workout regimen at the moment is nonexistent. I wake up in the morning and brush my teeth. My toothbrush and deodorant are my only dumbbells. That's about it.
author: Josh Bowman

text: You know what I like to do? I love waking up early, making them breakfast, taking them to school, having time in the morning with them. With six kids, it's like a reality show.
author: Allan Houston

text: Nobody wakes up in the morning thinking, 'I'm a bad guy.' They think they're the right guy.
author: Ray Stevenson

text: When I run in the morning, my body spends the first 20 minutes trying to figure out what's happening to it.
author: Danny Pudi

text: I can't find my car keys in the morning. Trying to get out of my house is a nightmare. 'Where's my wallet? Where are my keys? I have to go find a missing person.'
author: Anthony LaPaglia
